name: Eat My Beat
description:
Create circuits to play songs and defeat enemies.

Instructions:

1. Ensure graphics settings suit your display to avoid stuttering/tearing.

Sandbox Mode notes:

The following nodes are available to construct:

1. Simple wire

2. Intersection wire

3. Riser wire (for constructing bridges)

4. Directional wire

5. Sequencer (sequentially fire next output pin)

6. Counter (block output until count matches)

Also, the wireframe boxes on certain nodes are buttons, try hovering on them.
